data.name: GridBandColumnCollectionView

data.value: Gets the number of visible columns.

data.name: GridBandCustomizationCaption

data.name: GridBandImageAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the band header image alignment.

data.name: GridBandImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed within the band header.

data.name: GridBandMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the band's minimum allowed width.

data.name: GridBandOptionsBand
data.value: Provides access to the band's options.

data.name: GridBandRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the band header height in rows.

data.name: GridBandTag
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the current band.

data.name: GridBandToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets a custom tooltip for the band.

data.name: GridBandVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band is visible.

data.name: GridBandWidth
data.value: Gets or sets band width.

data.name: GridCellColumn
data.value: Gets the column which contains the cell.

data.name: GridCellRowHandle
data.value: Gets the handle of the row which owns the cell.

data.name: GridColumnAllowSummaryMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether all supported summaries or only the Count summary are enabled in the column's footer context menu.

data.name: GridColumnAppearanceCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column's data cells.

data.name: GridColumnAppearanceHeader
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the column header.

data.name: GridColumnCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the column's display caption.

data.name: GridColumnCollectionItem
data.value: Gets the column specified by the bound field name.

data.name: GridColumnColumnEdit
data.value: Gets or sets the repository item specifying the editor used to edit a column's cell values.

data.name: GridColumnCustomizationCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the column's caption when its header is displayed within the Customization Form.

data.name: GridColumnDisplayFormat
data.value: Provides access to the object specifying the formatting applied to column values.

data.name: GridColumnFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the column's unique field name. For bound columns, this property refers to a field in the underlying data source.

data.name: GridColumnFieldNameSortGroup
data.value: Gets or sets another field by which data is sorted/grouped/filtered when sorting/grouping/filtering is applied to the current column.

data.name: GridColumnFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets how column values are filtered via the auto filter row and filter dropdown.

data.name: GridColumnFixed
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the column takes part in horizontal View scrolling or is anchored to a View edge.

data.name: GridColumnGroupFormat
data.value: Provides access to the formatting settings for the column's values which are displayed within group rows.

data.name: GridColumnGroupIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the value specifying whether the column takes part in grouping and at which level.

data.name: GridColumnGroupInterval
data.value: Gets or sets how data rows are grouped when grouping by the current column is applied. Not supported in Server Mode.

data.name: GridColumnImage
data.value: Gets or sets an image displayed within the Column Header.

data.name: GridColumnImageAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the column header image alignment.

data.name: GridColumnImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed within the column header.

data.name: GridColumnMaxWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column's maximum width.

data.name: GridColumnMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column's minimum allowed width.

data.name: GridColumnOptionsColumn
data.value: Provides access to the column's options.

data.name: GridColumnOptionsEditForm
data.value: Provides access to the settings of the editor that corresponds to the current column within an Edit Form.

data.name: GridColumnOptionsFilter
data.value: Provides access to the filter options for the current column.

data.name: GridColumnReadOnlyCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual columns.

data.name: GridColumnReadOnlyCollectionView
data.value: Gets the View that owns the current column collection.

data.name: GridColumnShowButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying which column cells display editor buttons.

data.name: GridColumnShowUnboundExpressionMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can open an Expression Editor for the current unbound column, using a context menu.

data.name: GridColumnSortInfoCollectionGroupCount
data.value: Gets or sets how many of the elements starting from the beginning of the collection refer to columns used to group data.

data.name: GridColumnSortInfoCollectionItem
data.value: Gets the collection's item that refers to the specified column.

data.name: GridColumnSortInfoCollectionView
data.value: Gets the View which obtains its sorting and grouping settings from the current collection.

data.name: GridColumnSortInfoColumn
data.value: Gets or sets the column which is sorted by the GridColumnSortInfo.SortOrder.

data.name: GridColumnSortInfoIsGrouped
data.value: Indicates whether the column which is referred to by the current GridColumnSortInfo object is a grouping column.

data.name: GridColumnSortInfoSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the column's sort order.

data.name: GridColumnSortMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the column's data is sorted when sorting/grouping is applied to it.

data.name: GridColumnSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the column's sort order.

data.name: GridColumnSummary
data.value: Allows you to add multiple total summaries for a column. These summaries are displayed within the View Footer.

data.name: GridColumnSummaryItem
data.value: Provides access to the column's footer summary settings.

data.name: GridColumnTag
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the column.

data.name: GridColumnToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets a custom tooltip for the column.

data.name: GridColumnUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for the current unbound column.

data.name: GridColumnUnboundType
data.value: Gets or sets the data type and binding mode of the column.

data.name: GridColumnVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column is visible.

data.name: GridColumnVisibleIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the column's visible state and position within the View.

data.name: GridColumnWidth
data.value: Gets or sets column width.

data.name: GridControlAllowRestoreSelectionAndFocusedRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether to preserve the focused row and selection after sorting, grouping or filtering.

data.name: GridControlBindingContext
data.value: Gets or sets the BindingContext for the control.

data.name: GridControlDataMember
data.value: Gets or sets a sub-list of the data source (GridControl.DataSource) whose data is supplied for the grid control's main View.

data.name: GridControlDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the grid control's data source.

data.name: GridControlDataSourceChanged
data.value: Fires when changing the GridControl.DataSource property value.

data.name: GridControlDefaultViewChanged
data.value: Fires when zooming a View in or out.

data.name: GridControlEmbeddedNavigator
data.value: Provides access to the embedded data navigator.

data.name: GridControlFocusedViewChanged
data.value: Fires in response to focus moving between Views.

data.name: GridControlKeyboardFocusViewChanged
data.value: Fires when moving focus between Views.

data.name: GridControlLoad
data.value: Fires when a grid control is displayed for the first time.

data.name: GridControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to settings controlling the grid control's look and feel.

data.name: GridControlProcessGridKey
data.value: Enables you to process key presses before they are processed by the grid control.

data.name: GridControlServerMode
data.value: Gets whether server mode is enabled.

data.name: GridControlShowOnlyPredefinedDetails
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grid Control displays only the relationships that exist in the GridControl.LevelTree.

data.name: GridControlUseDisabledStatePainter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control is painted grayed out, when it's in the disabled state.

data.name: GridControlUseEmbeddedNavigator
data.value: Gets or sets whether the embedded data navigator is visible.

data.name: GridControlViewCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual Views.

data.name: GridControlViewRegistered
data.value: Fires when a new detail clone is created.

data.name: GridControlViewRemoved
data.value: Fires when a detail clone is being disposed of.

data.name: GridFormatRuleColumn
data.value: Gets or sets a column that provides values to test against the current format rule. By default, the format is applied to this column.

data.name: GridFormatRuleColumnApplyTo
data.value: Gets or sets a column, to which the format should be applied instead of the column specified by the GridFormatRule.Column property.

data.name: GridGroupSummaryItemShowInGroupColumnFooter
data.value: Gets or sets the column whose group footer cells should display summary values.

data.name: GridLevelNodeCollectionItem
data.value: Gets a node by the name of the relationship which it represents.

data.name: GridLevelNodeCollectionOwnerNode
data.value: Gets the node that owns the current collection.

data.name: GridLevelNodeHasChildren
data.value: Gets whether the current node has children

data.name: GridLevelNodeLevelTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the pattern view associated with a relationship.

data.name: GridLevelNodeRelationName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the relationship for which the current node provides a pattern view.

data.name: GridLevelTreeIsRootLevel
data.value: Gets whether the current node is the root node.

data.name: GridLookUpEditEditorTypeName
data.value: Gets the class name of the current editor.

data.name: GridLookUpEditProperties
data.value: Specifies settings specific to the current editor.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAlignGroupSummaryInGroupRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether to forcibly display group summaries in group rows under corresponding column headers and to hide group footers.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAllowFixedGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether the top visible group row is always displayed when scrolling through grouped data.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAllowIncrementalSearch
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether end-users can locate rows by typing the desired column value.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAllowPartialGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether to hide group rows if they contain only a single data row.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAllowPartialRedrawOnScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether a View is partially repainted when it's scrolled vertically by a row.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAllowPixelScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether smooth pixel-based vertical scrolling is enabled for rows.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAutoExpandAllGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether all the groups within the View are automatically expanded.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorAutoUpdateTotalSummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether total summaries are automatically updated to reflect changes in column values.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorEditingMode
data.value: Gets or sets the mode in which a data record can be edited - inplace or via a dedicated inline or popup Edit Form.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorKeepGroupExpandedOnSorting
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the group rows' expanded state is preserved when applying data sorting.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorSmartVertScrollBar
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether scrolling the View to the bottom places the last row at the top of the View.

data.name: GridOptionsBehaviorSummariesIgnoreNullValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether null values must be ignored when calculating summaries.

data.name: GridOptionsClipboardAllowCopy
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can copy selected cells to the clipboard.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowColumnMoving
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to move columns by dragging their headers.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowColumnResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to change the width of grid columns.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether end-users can filter data using the filter dropdowns.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowGroup
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether end-users can apply data grouping.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowQuickHideColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether a column/band can be hidden by dragging it away from the Column Header Panel, even if the Customization Form is not open.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowRowSizing
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether end-users can resize data rows vertically.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether end-users can apply data sorting.

data.name: GridOptionsCustomizationCustomizationFormSearchBoxVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the displays the search box allowing an end-user to input a criterion to filter the list of available columns and bands.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailAllowExpandEmptyDetails
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether master rows can be expanded when details have no data.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailAllowOnlyOneMasterRowExpanded
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether several master rows can be expanded simultaneously.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailAllowZoomDetail
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the View's immediate details can be maximized to fit the entire grid control's area.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailAutoZoomDetail
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether details are automatically maximized to fit the entire grid control's area when corresponding master rows are expanded.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailEnableDetailToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether detail tooltips are enabled for detail Views that are opened via the current master View. This option must be applied to a master View.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailEnableMasterViewMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the View's details can be displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailShowDetailTabs
data.value: Gets or sets whether detail tabs are displayed in detail sections when master rows of the current master View are expanded. This option must be applied to a master View.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailSmartDetailExpand
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current master View is automatically scrolled when one of its detail Views at the first level is expanded, so all rows in that detail View will be displayed. This functionality is supported only when expanding first level detail Views.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailSmartDetailExpandButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies the manner in which master-detail expand buttons are painted.

data.name: GridOptionsDetailSmartDetailHeight
data.value: Reserved for future use.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormActionOnModifiedRowChange
data.value: Gets or sets an action performed when an end-user moves focus to another grid row while an opened Edit Form contains unsaved changes.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormBindingMode
data.value: Gets or sets the mode in which data from an Edit Form is passed back to the grid.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormCustomEditFormLayout
data.value: Gets or sets the custom user control used as an Edit Form.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormEditFormColumnCount
data.value: Gets or sets the total number of layout columns within an Edit Form.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormFormCaptionFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the custom caption of an EditFrom displayed as a modal window. This property is in effect in the GridEditingMode.EditForm mode.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormPopupEditFormWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of an Edit Form displayed as a modal window.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormShowOnDoubleClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether an Edit Form can be opened by double-clicking the mouse.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormShowOnEnterKey
data.value: Gets or sets whether an Edit Form can be opened by the Enter key.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormShowOnF2Key
data.value: Gets or sets whether an Edit Form can be opened with the F2 key.

data.name: GridOptionsEditFormShowUpdateCancelPanel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Update and Cancel buttons are displayed within an Edit Form.

data.name: GridOptionsHintShowCellHints
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether hints are displayed for cells with truncated content.

data.name: GridOptionsHintShowColumnHeaderHints
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether hints are displayed for column headers displaying truncated captions.

data.name: GridOptionsHintShowFooterHints
data.value: Gets or sets whether tooltips are displayed for footer cells, when the text is clipped.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuDialogFormBorderEffect
data.value: Gets or sets the border adornment effect for dialog forms within the GridView.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuEnableColumnMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether the end-users can invoke Column Header Context Menu.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuEnableFooterMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke footer context menus.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuEnableGroupPanelMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the group panel context menu.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowAddNewSummaryItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not the footer menu contains an item that allows adding multiple total summaries for a column at runtime.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowAutoFilterRowItem
data.value: Gets whether the \"Show Auto Filter Row\" check item is displayed within the Column Header Context Menu.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowConditionalFormattingItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Conditional Formatting menu is available in a column's context menu at runtime, allowing end-users to apply style formats to columns.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowDateTimeGroupIntervalItems
data.value: Gets or sets whether a menu that enables switching group modes for date-time columns is available at runtime.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowGroupSortSummaryItems
data.value: Gets or sets whether a context menu for grouping columns contains commands that allow group rows to be sorted according to group summary values.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowGroupSummaryEditorItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can invoke a Group Summary Editor at runtime, via a context menu.

data.name: GridOptionsMenuShowSplitItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Split command is available in the Grid Control's context menu.

data.name: GridOptionsNavigationAutoFocusNewRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether adding a new record to an underlying data source automatically moves focus to the corresponding grid row.

data.name: GridOptionsNavigationAutoMoveRowFocus
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether horizontal navigation keys move focus to the next/previous row when the current row's last/first cell is focused.

data.name: GridOptionsNavigationEnterMoveNextColumn
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the ENTER key can be used to move cell focus.

data.name: GridOptionsNavigationUseOfficePageNavigation
data.value: Enables the Office 2007 navigation mode, where pressing the PAGE DOWN key moves focus to the bottom visible record, and pressing the PAGE UP key moves focus to the top visible record.

data.name: GridOptionsNavigationUseTabKey
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the TAB/SHIFT+TAB key combinations move focus to the next/previous row cell or to the next/previous control in tab order.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether widths of columns in the print/export output are automatically changed so that the View fits the page width.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintEnableAppearanceEvenRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether even rows in the print/export output are painted using the appearance settings provided by the GridViewPrintAppearances.EvenRow property.This option is in effect when the GridOptionsPrint.UsePrintStyles property is set to true.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintEnableAppearanceOddRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether odd rows in the print/export output are painted using the appearance settings provided by the GridViewPrintAppearances.OddRow property.This option is in effect when the GridOptionsPrint.UsePrintStyles property is set to true.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintExpandAllDetails
data.value: Gets or sets whether the View is printed/exported with all master rows expanded.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintExpandAllGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether the View is printed/exported with all group rows expanded.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintDetails
data.value: Gets or sets to print/export details of master rows.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintFilterInfo
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the filter panel in the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintFooter
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the view footer in the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintGroupFooter
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display group footers in the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display column headers in the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines are printed/exported.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintPreview
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the preview sections in the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintSelectedRowsOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether only the focused/selected rows are printed/exported.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintPrintVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical grid lines are displayed in the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintSplitCellPreviewAcrossPages
data.value: Gets or sets whether preview sections are allowed to be split across pages when printing/exporting.

data.name: GridOptionsPrintUsePrintStyles
data.value: Gets or sets whether print appearances are used when the grid control is printed/exported.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionCheckBoxSelectorColumnWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the built-in check column.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionEnableAppearanceFocusedCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings for focused cell are enabled.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionEnableAppearanceFocusedRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings for a focused row are enabled.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionEnableAppearanceHideSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings used to paint the selected row(s) when the grid control is not focused are enabled.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionInvertSelection
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the focused style is applied to the focused cell only or to all but the focused row cell.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionMultiSelectMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple cells or rows can be selected.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionResetSelectionClickOutsideCheckboxSelector
data.value: Gets or sets whether the selection made in the check column is discarded on a click in the grid outside the check column.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionShowCheckBoxSelectorChangesSelectionNavigation
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple row selection in the built-in check column can be changed while navigating through grid rows with the keyboard.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionShowCheckBoxSelectorInColumnHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether a check box is displayed within the Check column header allowing an end-user to select/deselect all grid rows simultaneously.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionShowCheckBoxSelectorInGroupRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the selection check box is displayed in a group row allowing an end-user to select/deselect all grid rows of a group simultaneously.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionShowCheckBoxSelectorInPrintExport
data.value: Gets or sets whether the built-in check column is inserted into the print/export output.

data.name: GridOptionsSelectionUseIndicatorForSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether rows can be selected via the Row Indicator Panel when the grid is in multiple selection mode.

data.name: GridOptionsViewAllowCellMerge
data.value: Gets or sets whether neighboring cells with identical values merge.

data.name: GridOptionsViewAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether column and band icons within the current View should be painted with the same colors as the column captions.

data.name: GridOptionsViewAllowHtmlDrawGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML tags can be used to format text in group rows.

data.name: GridOptionsViewAllowHtmlDrawHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML formatting can be applied to column and band captions.

data.name: GridOptionsViewAutoCalcPreviewLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the number of text lines within preview sections is calculated automatically depending on their contents.

data.name: GridOptionsViewBestFitMaxRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of data rows whose content is processed to apply best fit to columns.

data.name: GridOptionsViewBestFitUseErrorInfo
data.value: Gets or sets whether cell error icons are taken into account when calculating the \"best width\" for columns.

data.name: GridOptionsViewColumnAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether column widths are automatically modified so that the total columns' width matches the View's width.

data.name: GridOptionsViewEnableAppearanceEvenRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the even rows are painted using the appearance settings provided by the GridViewAppearances.EvenRow property.

data.name: GridOptionsViewEnableAppearanceOddRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the odd rows are painted using the appearance settings provided by the GridViewAppearances.OddRow property.

data.name: GridOptionsViewGroupDrawMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying how group rows should be painted.

data.name: GridOptionsViewGroupFooterShowMode
data.value: Gets or sets which groups display footers.

data.name: GridOptionsViewHeaderFilterButtonShowMode
data.value: Gets or sets the display style of column filter buttons.

data.name: GridOptionsViewNewItemRowPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the new item row's position within the View.

data.name: GridOptionsViewRowAutoHeight
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the height of each data row is automatically adjusted to completely display the contents of its cells.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowAutoFilterRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the auto filter row is displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowChildrenInGroupPanel
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the View's group panel acts as a joined group panel.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether column headers are displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowDetailButtons
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether master rows display master-detail expand buttons.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowFooter
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the view footer is displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowGroupedColumns
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether grouping columns are displayed within the View.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowGroupExpandCollapseButtons
data.value: Gets or sets whether group expand buttons are visible.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowGroupPanel
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the group panel is visible.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowGroupPanelColumnsAsSingleRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether group column headers are arranged in the group panel in a horizontal line.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowHorizontalLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines are displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowIndicator
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the row indicator panel is displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowPreview
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether preview sections are displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowPreviewRowLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal lines are displayed below preview sections.

data.name: GridOptionsViewShowVerticalLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical grid lines are displayed.

data.name: GridOptionsViewWaitAnimationOptions
data.value: Gets or sets how async data loading operations are indicated. This property is in effect in Instant Feedback Mode.

data.name: GridSummaryItemCollectionActiveCount
data.value: Gets the number of summary items participating in summary calculations.

data.name: GridSummaryItemCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual summary items.

data.name: GridSummaryItemCollectionView
data.value: Gets the View that owns the current summary item collection.

data.name: GridSummaryItemDisplayFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the summary value formatting.

data.name: GridSummaryItemFieldName

data.name: GridSummaryItemFormat

data.name: GridSummaryItemSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the aggregation function type.

data.name: GridSummaryItemTag
data.value: Gets or sets data associated with the summary item.

data.name: GridViewAfterPrintRow
data.value: Fires after an individual row has been printed/exported, and allows you to add custom information to the printout/export output.

data.name: GridViewAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the Grid View's elements.

data.name: GridViewAppearancePrint
data.value: Provides access to the properties that specify the appearances of the Grid View's elements when they are printed/exported.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesColumnFilterButton
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint filter buttons.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesColumnFilterButtonActive
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the filter buttons displayed within columns that are involved in filtering.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesCustomizationFormHint
data.value: Gets or sets the appearance of the hint text displayed within an empty Customization Form.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesDetailTip
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the detail tooltips.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesEmpty
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the View's empty space.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesEvenRow
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint even data rows.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesFixedLine
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the fixed lines.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesFocusedCell

data.name: GridViewAppearancesFocusedRow

data.name: GridViewAppearancesFooterPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the view footer.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesGroupButton
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint group expand buttons.

data.name: GridViewAppearancesGroupFooter
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the group footer.

data.value: Gets or sets the scroll bar's orientation in multi row display mode.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsMultiRecordModeStretchCardToViewHeight
data.value: Gets or sets whether cards are stretched vertically to fully fill the View's height. This option is in effect when cards are arranged in rows (in Row and MultiRow view modes).

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsMultiRecordModeStretchCardToViewWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether cards are stretched horizontally to fully fill the View's width. This option is in effect when cards are arranged in columns (in Column and MultiColumn view modes).

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrint
data.value: Provides options that control how the View is printed/exported.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintMaxCardColumns
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of columns in the print/export output. This option is in effect when cards are arranged in multiple columns (the LayoutViewOptionsPrint.PrintMode property is set to MultiColumn).

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintMaxCardRows
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows in the print/export output. This option is in effect when cards are arranged in multiple rows (the LayoutViewOptionsPrint.PrintMode property is set to MultiRow).

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintPrintCardCaption
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether card captions are displayed in the print/export output.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintPrintFilterInfo
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the filter panel is displayed in the print/export output.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintPrintMode
data.value: Gets or sets the card layout when the View is printed/exported.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintPrintSelectedCardsOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether only the focused/selected cards are printed/exported.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsPrintUsePrintStyles
data.value: Gets or sets whether print styles or the View's appearance settings are used when printing/exporting the View.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsSingleRecordMode
data.value: Provides access to a card's display options applied in single card display mode.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsSingleRecordModeCardAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the card's alignment within the View when the card is stretched to fully fill the View's width or height. This option is in effect when the LayoutViewOptionsSingleRecordMode.StretchCardToViewHeight or LayoutViewOptionsSingleRecordMode.StretchCardToViewWidth property is enabled (not both).

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsSingleRecordModeStretchCardToViewHeight
data.value: Gets or sets whether the currently visible card is stretched vertically to fully fill the View's height. This option is in effect in Single Record view mode.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsSingleRecordModeStretchCardToViewWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the currently visible card is stretched horizontally to fully fill the View's width. This option is in effect in Single Record view mode.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the View's appearance options.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewAllowBorderColorBlending
data.value: Gets or sets whether the card caption and border color specified using appearance settings is blended with the color specified by the currently applied skin.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewAllowHotTrackFields
data.value: Gets or sets whether card fields are highlighted when hovering over them with the mouse cursor.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewCardArrangeRule
data.value: Gets or sets whether only entire cards can be displayed at the same time, or allow cards to be partially displayed.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewCardsAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets whether the top, center or bottom of cards are aligned when they have different heights.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewContentAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets whether cards are centered within the View, or aligned to its specific edge.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewFocusRectStyle
data.value: Gets or sets how the focus rectangle is painted around fields.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewPartialCardsSimpleScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets how the Layout View is scrolled when partial cards are enabled.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewPartialCardWrapThreshold
data.value: Gets or sets the threshold for partially displayed cards, in pixels.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowCardBorderIfCaptionHidden
data.value: Gets or sets whether a card's border is painted when the card caption is hidden.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowCardCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether a card's caption bar is visible.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowCardExpandButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether expand/collapse buttons are displayed within card captions.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowCardFieldBorders
data.value: Gets or sets whether borders are displayed for card fields. This property is not supported in all skins.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowCardLines
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether card separators are displayed.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowFieldHints
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether hints are displayed for card fields with truncated content.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewShowHeaderPanel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Header Panel is visible.

data.name: LayoutViewOptionsViewViewMode
data.value: Gets or sets the card layout.

data.name: LayoutViewTemplateCard
data.value: Represents the card that serves as a template for all cards displayed within the View at runtime.

data.name: LayoutViewVisibleRecordIndexChanged
data.value: Fires on scrolling the Layout View.

data.name: OptionsBandAllowHotTrack
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band header's appearance is changed when the mouse hovers over it.

data.name: OptionsBandAllowMove
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can move the band by dragging its header.

data.name: OptionsBandAllowPress
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band's header can be pressed.

data.name: OptionsBandAllowSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band can be resized by dragging the right edge of its header.

data.name: OptionsBandFixedWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band's width remains fixed when the View's auto width feature is enabled and the View is resized.

data.name: OptionsBandShowCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band's caption is displayed within the band header.

data.name: OptionsBandShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the band's header is displayed within the Customization Form when the band is invisible.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowEdit
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke editors for the column's cells.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can move focus to the column using either the mouse or keyboard.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowGroup
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the column's header to the group panel to group data against the column's values.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowIncrementalSearch
data.value: Gets or sets whether incremental searches can be performed on the column.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowMerge
data.value: Gets or sets whether neighboring cells with identical values can be merged within the current column.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowMove
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the column's header.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowShowHide
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column can be hidden or restored by an end-user.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the column header's right edge to change the column's width.

data.name: OptionsColumnAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort data by the column's values.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the caption of the editor that represents the current grid column within an Edit Form.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormCaptionLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the caption location of an editor that represents the current grid column within an Edit Form.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormColumnSpan
data.value: Gets or sets the number of layout columns the editor spans within an Edit Form. Set the OptionsColumnEditForm.UseEditorColRowSpan property to false for the ColumnSpan property to be in effect.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormStartNewRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the editor starts a new layout row within an Edit Form.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormUseEditorColRowSpan
data.value: Gets of sets whether each editor spans the default number of layout columns and rows, specified by the editor's type.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether an editor that corresponds to the current grid column is visible within an Edit Form.

data.name: OptionsColumnEditFormVisibleIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the integer that indicates the position of an editor representing the current grid column within an Edit Form.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterAllowAutoFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's values can be filtered using the auto filter row.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the filter button in Grid Views (field filter button in Layout Views) is displayed within the column header.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterAllowFilterModeChanging
data.value: Gets or sets whether a dedicated menu item is available in a column header menu that allows an end-user to change the filter mode for columns.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterAutoFilterCondition
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the comparison operator used to create filter conditions for the current column via the auto filter row.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterFilterBySortField
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's Filter Dropdown List displays values of the GridColumn.FieldNameSortGroup field or values of the GridColumn.FieldName field.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterFilterPopupMode
data.value: Gets or sets the display mode for the current column's filter dropdown.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterImmediateUpdateAutoFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's filter condition is updated as soon as an end-user modifies the contents of the Auto Filter Row's cell.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterImmediateUpdatePopupDateFilterOnCheck
data.value: This option is in effect for date-time columns whose filter dropdown list contains an embedded calendar with check boxes to select common date intervals.It specifies whether toggling the check boxes filters grid records immediately.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterImmediateUpdatePopupDateFilterOnDateChange
data.value: This option is in effect for date-time columns whose filter dropdown list contains an embedded calendar with check boxes to select common date intervals.It specifies whether selecting a date or date range via the embedded calendar filters grid records immediately.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterShowBlanksFilterItems
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's Filter Dropdown (when presented as a Regular List or Checked List) displays the \"(Blanks)\" and \"(Non Blanks)\" filter items.

data.name: OptionsColumnFilterShowEmptyDateFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether a Filter Dropdown List has a filter used to select records that contain null values in a date-time column.

data.name: OptionsColumnFixedWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's width remains the same when the column's auto width feature is enabled.

data.name: OptionsColumnImmediateUpdateRowPosition
data.value: Gets or sets whether the focused row's position is immediately updated according to the sorting, grouping and filtering settings after the current column data has been posted.

data.name: OptionsColumnPrintable
data.value: Gets or sets whether a column is included in the print/export output. This property is supported only when the column belongs to the GridView object.

data.name: OptionsColumnReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are prevented from editing the column's cell values.

data.name: OptionsColumnShowCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's caption is displayed within the column header.

data.name: OptionsColumnShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's header is displayed within the Customization Form when the column is hidden.

data.name: OptionsColumnShowInExpressionEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current column is available in the field list in the Expression Editor.

data.name: OptionsColumnTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column can be focused via the TAB key.

data.name: OptionsFieldSortFilterButtonLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of sort and filter buttons within the region where these buttons are displayed.

data.name: OptionsFieldSortFilterButtonShowMode
data.value: Gets or sets the region where sort and filter buttons are displayed.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditAutoComplete
data.value: Gets or sets whether the automatic completion feature is enabled

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditBaseOwnerEdit
data.value: Gets the editor which owns the current repository item object.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditBasePopupFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets how records in the dropdown window are filtered when typing text within the edit box.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditBaseView
data.value: Gets or sets the View used to represent data in the dropdown.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditBaseViewType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of View used to represent data in the dropdown.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditEditorTypeName
data.value: Gets the class name of the current editor.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditOwnerEdit
data.value: Gets the editor which owns the current repository item object.

data.name: RepositoryItemGridLookUpEditServerMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether server mode is enabled.

data.name: RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEditAddNewValue
data.value: Fires when the \"Add New\" button is clicked, and allows you to add new records to the dropdown data source.

data.name: RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEditEditorTypeName
data.value: Gets the class name of the current editor.

data.name: RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEditPopupFindMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether data searching starts automatically, or should be started manually.

data.name: RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEditShowAddNewButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the \"Add New\" button is displayed within the editor's dropdown.

data.name: RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEditShowClearButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the \"Clear\" button is displayed within the editor's dropdown.

data.name: RepositoryItemSearchLookUpEditTextEditStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style in which text is displayed and edited in the editor.

data.name: SearchLookUpEditAddNewValue
data.value: Fires when the \"Add New\" button is clicked, and allows you to add new records to the dropdown data source.

data.name: SearchLookUpEditEditorTypeName
data.value: Gets the class name of the current editor.

data.name: SearchLookUpEditProperties
data.value: Specifies settings specific to the current editor.

data.name: StyleFormatConditionApplyToRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings are to be applied to rows or individual cells.

data.name: StyleFormatConditionCollectionIsLoading
data.value: Gets a value which specifies whether the View that owns the current collection is being initialized.

data.name: StyleFormatConditionCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to individual items within the collection.

data.name: StyleFormatConditionCollectionView
data.value: Gets the View that owns the collection.

data.name: StyleFormatConditionColumn
data.value: Gets or sets the column whose values take part in conditional formatting.

data.name: ViewFilterChanged
data.value: Occurs when the current collection has been changed.

data.name: ViewFilterCriteria
data.value: Specifies the View's filter criteria.

data.name: ViewFilterDisplayText
data.value: Gets the textual representation of the entire filter string.

data.name: ViewFilterExpression
data.value: Gets the total filter expression.

data.name: ViewFilterFilterExpression
data.value: Gets the filter criteria which is applied to a View.

data.name: ViewFilterIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the collection of filter conditions is empty.

data.name: ViewFilterItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the items in the collection.

data.name: ViewFilterNonColumnFilter
data.value: Gets or sets a filter expression that is not associated with any column.

data.name: ViewFilterNonColumnFilterCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the filter criteria not bound to any column.

data.name: ViewPrintOptionsBaseAllowCancelPrintExport
data.value: Gets or sets whether the print/export progress window contains a Cancel button, which allows an end-user to cancel the current print/export operation.

data.name: ViewPrintOptionsBaseAutoResetPrintDocument
data.value: Gets or sets whether a print/export document is automatically cleared and then generated each time it is sent to the print/export output.In server mode, this option is not in effect.

data.name: ViewPrintOptionsBaseShowPrintExportProgress
data.value: Gets or sets whether a separate window is used to indicate print/export progress.

data.name: WinExplorerViewAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the appearance settings for all visual elements within this WinExplorerView.

data.name: WinExplorerViewAppearancePrint
data.value: Provides access to the properties that specify the WinExplorerView's element appearances when the View is printed/exported.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsBehavior
data.value: Gets the object that stores the common View's behavior settings.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoad
data.value: Provides access to properties that manage View item image behavior.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoadAnimationType
data.value: Gets or sets the animation effect that follows item image display.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoadAsyncLoad
data.value: Gets or sets whether images for View items should be loaded asynchronously.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoadCacheThumbnails
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not asynchronously loaded item images should be cached.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoadDesiredThumbnailSize
data.value: Gets or sets the desired size of thumbnail images, created during the Asynchronous Image Load.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoadLoadThumbnailImagesFromDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets whether items should load their images from an image source when these images need to be loaded asynchronously.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsImageLoadRandomShow
data.value: Gets or sets whether item images should be loaded in random order.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsNavigation
data.value: Provides access to the set of properties that manage the WinExplorerView navigation.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsSelection
data.value: Provides access to this WinExplorerView's selection options.

data.name: WinExplorerViewOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to general WinExplorerView settings.
